text: We're not trying to change the world just music.
author: Jonathan Davis

text: I've been a fan of electronic music since the beginning.
author: Jonathan Davis

text: It's really cool to see glowsticks at the show, to see dance music culture infiltrating and becoming one with the metal community.
author: Jonathan Davis

text: It seems like a lot of music today is so churned out and simple.
author: Jonathan Davis

text: Singing is just a feeling set to music.
author: Carrie Underwood
